channel.title: VPS OS & CPanel questions
channel.description:
So I am going to order a Linux VPS soon, and I was wondering which template is best, and what version I should get of it (Also 32/64 Bit?): CentOS (4, 5, 5.5, 6) Debain (4, 5, 6) Ubunto (8.10, 9.04, 9.10, 10.04, 10.10) Gentoo Ferado (10, 11, 12)
And is a CPanel required? Because they are pretty expensive, and what fo they exactly do?
Thanks

item.title: VPS OS & CPanel questions
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Please keep your VPS questions to the official sticky.
